plugin.name: ðŸ•“ Event Helpers
plugin.description: Commands to extend NotePlan's events handling, including time blocks. See link for more details, and configuration.
plugin.author: jgclark

plugin.commands.name: time blocks to calendar
plugin.commands.description: promote time blocks to be full calendar events

plugin.commands.name: insert day's events as list
plugin.commands.description: insert list of this day's calendar events at cursor

plugin.commands.name: list day's events to log
plugin.commands.description: list this day's calendar events to the log

plugin.commands.name: insert matching events
plugin.commands.description: inserts this day's calendar events matching certain patterns at cursor

plugin.commands.name: process date offsets
plugin.commands.description: finds date offset patterns and turns them into due dates, based on date at start of section
